EmailTemplate.name: IMPLCoordinatorNotificationTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Group Structure Changes for {!Implementation_Coordinator__c.AccountLegalNameForWF1__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello. Please be advised that National Account {!Implementation_Coordinator__c.AccountLegalNameForWF1__c} is currently undergoing an Off Cycle Change under Implementation Case {!Implementation_Coordinator__c.Implementation_Record_ID__c} in which the Group Structure has been changed and may impact incentive setups.
This change is effective {!Implementation_Coordinator__c.Implementation_Effective_Date__c}. Please review the updated version of the Group Structure, which is located on the National Implementation Center SharePoint site.
Thank you.
